questions.question: How would you describe Lady Russell? Does her friendship with and mentoring of Anne influence Anne's decisions?
questions.author: Lyla Bird
questions.message: Lady Russell has been a close friend and mentor to Anne. Can their close relationship lay any claim to Anne's decisions?

questions.question: Which sister do you feel best embodies the words 'sense' and 'sensability'?
questions.author: Gemma Wittier
questions.message: Which would carry more weight for you if you were an eligible woman during this time period?

questions.question: Are Emma's actions towards Harriet Smith truly well-intentioned or are they something less altruistic?
questions.author: Jean Cypress
questions.message: Is Emma a good friend to Harriet? Does she deserve Mr. Knightley criticisms on the subject?

questions.question: Jane Bennet is praised beyond measure in this book. What would you make of the story if Jane were the protagonist instead of Elizabeth?
questions.author: George Hachet
questions.message: Do you believe Elizabeth resents Jane for her accomplishments and beauty? Do you believe she tries to distance herself from Jane in temperament so as to not be compared to her?
